channel.title: Hemp
channel.description:
What are your thoughts on using hemp as a resource?
I think it is a great renewable resource that almost sounds too good to be true. It can actually do pretty much everything and better than how we currently do it but because you can smoke it for some reason it is the devil's tool.
For those uninformed: http://www.hemphasis.net/

item.title: Hemp
item.dc:creator: @BorigTheDwarf BorigTheDwarf
item.description:
@BorigTheDwarf wrote:

ziplock:

We already use hemp? It contains no THC but there are still retards that try to smoke it. I used to have shoes made from hemp.

I realise this. But we can use it for /a lot/ more.

Also, I wanted a discussion AS WELL AS your opinion

Read full topic

item.title: Hemp
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:20, topic:441122”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=543798.msg3986230#msg3986230 date=1335917810]

We already use hemp? It contains no THC but there are still retards that try to smoke it. I used to have shoes made from hemp.

…so i cant smoke the hemp bracelet my friend made me? SHE LIES!

Nope, it just might make you short on breath for an hour or so.

Ah…ok

Or you could inseminate it with your own homemade THC!
pretty much what incense makers do?

Cuz i got a shitload of homemade THC >_>
[/quote]
Well, I’m sure there’s guides on youtube on how to make the smokeable incense stuff but it’s all chemicals I’d imagine.
I kinda wanna look into that now :|[/quote]
Nothing is stopping you.

Pro tip: use firefox’s ‘in:Private’ and go to 7 proxies so your invisible

Read full topic

item.title: Hemp
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:12, topic:441122”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=543798.msg3986117#msg3986117 date=1335911092]

Useful resource in my opinion.

you asked for my opinion? There’s other resources other then hemp.

That’ not an opinion :L
Besides, we have limited resources. I know it’s not like we’re going to run out in a few years, but we will eventually.

“We don’t need hemp”
-statement/opinion
[/quote]
From that statement you said “There’s other resources”, witch is a fact, not opinion
Whatever, though I don’t feel like debating over pointless things while I’m sick.[/quote]
It’s still an opinion… lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Hemp
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“BorigTheDwarf, post:8, topic:441122”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=543798.msg3986070#msg3986070 date=1335906221]

I read it, just sounds like a plot to get people to talk about smoking weed.
You don’t smoke hemp, you smoke marijuana nobody cares about ropes and shit.

Actually, just because you don’t care about the planet doesn’t mean other people don’t as well.

Next time post more information that isn’t completely bias towards the plant

I posted information that is true about the plant. I deliberately didn’t post anything about its use as a drug as that is so controversial.

We don’t need hemp, we have other resources to use instead of it that are perfectly fine.
[/quote]

Yes, because petrol isn’t running out, deforestation isn’t ruining our environment and the current method of making plastics isn’t shite.[/quote]
you asked for my opinion? There’s other resources other then hemp.

Read full topic
